_comment: Pretraining Encoder backbone using MaskedPrediction. Run train_mp.py script with this config. Projection Head is not used with MP training that's why its omitted

backbone._comment: This model uses internal masking on the latent frames and not full signal restoration, also using internal loss calculation. Thats why mask params and loss params need to be defined here
backbone.name: Transformer

classifier._comment: Classifier used to finetune it and benmchmark -> linear Evaluation
classifier.name: DLProjMLP

training_params._comment: All default sleepyco settings despite 'mode'. 'pretrain_mp' is passed to dataloader to use the base EEG epochs, not two-view as in 'pretrain'

early_stopping._comment: as validation is done at half an epoch, we max wait 4 validations(=2epochs)
